entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
